content: it s almost halloween so of course we all need a witch hat this is a very simple construction knit in the round from point to brim it s also available in three sizes - corresponding roughly to kid s women s and men s sizes - so it s perfect for the whole coven the small and medium size hats can be knit using a single skein but the large one *may* require a bit extra witch hat is suitable for all knitting levels including those who want to learn to knit in the round skills required *casting on and joining in the round *knitting *purling *kfb *k2tog *yarnover optional - for an eyelet row to thread a ribbon witch hat is available as a free download although if you would like to make a donation you can name your own price here 1 any proceeds will be donated to support mental health charities 1 https //payhip com/b/gfwxm
